doc:
Stephen Dorff https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephen_Dorff 0 Stephen Hartley Dorff Jr. (born July 29, 1973) is an American actor, known for portraying PK in The Power of One, Stuart Sutcliffe in Backbeat, Johnny Marco in Sofia Coppola's Somewhere, and for his roles in Blade (as self-styled vampire-overlord Deacon Frost), Cecil B. DeMented, The Motel Life, S.F.W. and Space Truckers. Stephen_Hartley_Dorff_Jr . ( born July_29_,_1973_) is an_American_actor , known for portraying_PK in The_Power of One , Stuart_Sutcliffe in Backbeat , Johnny_Marco in Sofia_Coppola 's_Somewhere , and for his_roles in Blade_( as self-styled_vampire-overlord_Deacon_Frost_) , Cecil_B._DeMented , The_Motel_Life , S.F.W. and Space_Truckers .
